Hi all,
I bought myself a katana, which Barry has very kindly taken his time to 
discuss it with me.
Thank you Barry!
I was suggested that I should see if the people on the list might give 
some information about the metal same which is fitted on the tsuka. I 
would like any information you might be willing to share.
 
Single picture (for dialers)
http://hem.bredband.net/odrike/images/Koshirae1/Tsuka1B.jpg
 
Many picures (for you that are interested in the other fittings)
http://hem.bredband.net/odrike/Koshirae1.htm

Regards,
Fredrik
